body: Fear passes quickly while you are raging.
name: Resolute Rager
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Orcs/New Racial Rules/Orc Feats/Resolute Rager

sections.body: While raging, when under the effect of a fear effect that allows a saving throw, you can make a new saving throw against that fear effect at the start of each of your turns before acting. If you make the new save, the fear effect ends.
sections.name: Benefit
